titleStmt.title: A Brief account of the proceedings of the French clergy, in taking away the Pope's usurp'd supremacy, shewing by what steps or degrees the same was effected by way of introduction to the Pope's letter, written to the clergy of France, 11th of Apr. 1682, and their protestarion [i.e. protestation] thereupon, 6th of May following, the letter condemning, and the protestation justifying and ratifying the said proceedings : both which are here published in Latine ... and in English ...

notesStmt.note: Pages 1-22 have two columns to the page, one in Latin, one in English.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
"The Popes letter to the clergy of France" (p. 1-13, 2nd count), and "The protestation of the Gallican clergy" (p. 15-22).
